          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Arbete - ordkunskap 1</string>
            <string language="en">Work - lexicology 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit - lexicology 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travail - lexicology 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalho - lexicology 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavoro - lexicology 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία - lexicology 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo - lexicology 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på ord som har med arbetslivet att göra.Modul 6 - Vad vill du? - Ord och uttryck 3.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here, we accustom on words that have with the working life to do.

Module 6 - what wants to you? - words and expressions 3.

Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">yrken</string>
            <string language="sv">arbete</string>
            <string language="sv">arbetsliv</string>
            <string language="sv">jobb</string>
            <string language="en">Safir</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">languages</string>
            <string language="en">trades</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>
            <string language="en">working lives</string>
            <string language="en">jobs</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier gewöhnen uns wir auf Wörtern, die mit dem 
Berufsleben zu do.Module 6 haben - was wünscht zu Ihnen? - 
Wörter und Ausdrücke 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici, nous nous accoutumons sur les mots qui ont 
avec la vie active à do.Module 6 - ce qui veut à vous ? - mots
et expressions 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui, nós acostumamo-nos nas palavras que têm 
com a vida de funcionamento a do.Module 6 - o que quer-lhe? - 
palavras e expressões 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui, accustom sulle parole che hanno con la vita 
attiva a do.Module 6 - che cosa desidera a voi? - parole ed 
espressioni 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ, accustom στις λέξεις που έχουν με την 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή κάνουμε την ενότητα 6 - τι θέλει σε σας; 
- λέξεις και εκφράσεις 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aquí, nos acostumbramos en las palabras que 
tienen con la vida laboral a do.Module 6 - qué desea a usted? -
palabras y expresiones 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
